
Dear customer 

* If you want to get the open source of "Ginga", please visit the website below. 
  http://opensource.lge.com 

* Firstly, you should click the menu of "Mobile". 

* Secondly, when you visit the website, write the word of "Ginga" in the search window. 

* You can get the result of search, 
  and then you can find the open source of Ginag in the software list. 

Thank you for your visiting our website.
